an10.196:0.3: Principles That Should Be Made Much Of
an10.196:1.1: “I will teach you the principle to make much of and the principle not to make much of. …
an10.196:1.3: And what is the principle not to make much of?
an10.196:1.6: This is called the principle not to make much of.
an10.196:2.1: And what is the principle to make much of?
an10.196:2.4: This is called the principle to make much of.”
